pr_title: Add bootstrapping for Oracle Linux 6, 7 and 8

Add bootstrapping for Oracle Linux 6, 7 and 8

timeline.bodyText: This needs to be in this order because Oracle also has /etc/redhat-release.
timeline.author: juliogonzalez

timeline.message: Add bootstrapping for Oracle Linux 6, 7 and 8
Add bootstrapping for Oracle Linux 6, 7 and 8

timeline.bodyText:
For reference, I failed originally because I created Oracle*.sls files.
Here are the grains from an Oracle Linux 8:
    os:
        OEL
    os_family:
        RedHat
    osarch:
        x86_64
    oscodename:
        Oracle Linux Server 8.2
    osfinger:
        Oracle Linux Server-8
    osfullname:
        Oracle Linux Server
    osmajorrelease:
        8
    osrelease:
        8.2
    osrelease_info:
        - 8
        - 2
timeline.author: juliogonzalez
